name: @nysds/components
description: New York State's design system and code component library.

scripts.build: npm run lint && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && vite build
scripts.build:packages: npm run clean:dist && npm run lint && node src/scripts/build-order.js
scripts.build:all: npm run clean:dist && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:packages && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:umd && npm run cem
scripts.release: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production npm run test && npm run cem && NODE_ENV=production npm publish --workspaces --access public && NODE_ENV=production npm publish --access public
scripts.release:dry-run: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && NODE_ENV=production npm run test && npm run cem && node src/scripts/publish-dry-run.js
scripts.release:alpha: npm run build && npm run build:umd && npm publish --tag next
scripts.test:build: npm run build:all && npm run test
scripts.storybook:build:all: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && npm run storybook
scripts.clean:node: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/**/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:dist: rm -rf storybook-static && rm -rf coverage && rm -rf packages/*/coverage && rm -rf dist && rm -rf packages/*/dist && rm -rf packages/**/*/dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:node

author: NYS Design System Team
